headline: Leon Topalian joins PPG board of directors
summary: PITTSBURGH, April 21, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that Leon J. Topalian, chair, president and chief executive officer of Nucor Corporation, has been elected to PPG’s board of directors, effective July 16, 2025. Topalian will serve on the Audit Committee and the Sustainability and Innovation Committee of PPG’s board.
